text:
Over the last 25 years, Lucanet
has built a class leading position

in consolidation
of financial planning software.

But we realized a few years ago
that there was an opportunity for us
to expand our capabilities

to cover all of the jobs
to be done in the office of the CFO.

We also realized that we needed
to transform our business

from a primarily on premises
solution to a cloud native SaaS service.

And we call the combination of these
two things our CFO solution platform.

Our business is growing at a phenomenal
rate, as are the businesses
of many of our customers.

We knew that scalability and global reach
were absolutely critical for us.

In addition, we got access to a catalog
of managed services and different

hosting options that allows our software
engineers to concentrate on writing code

that delivers real business
value and can be operated efficiently.

At AWS
we are working with software companies

like Lucanet to support them
on their SaaS transformation, meaning

not just migrating to the cloud,
but also modernizing their software stack.

The goal is to enable customers
like Lucanet

to grow their business
and operate efficient on AWS.

Three years ago, we started to build
a diverse team for Lucanet

with individuals
with different experience and backgrounds.

We want to make sure that Lucanet
is successful on AWS

and we have the right people and resources
for Lucanet in their specific needs.

Given that we are the custodians
of our customer's financial data,
security is absolutely paramount.

Building on AWS allows us to deliver
solutions to our customers

with the level of security
that they demand.
For us
the relationship with AWS

has also been key to the success
of our CFOs solution platform.

Our culture is one of constant innovation
and moving quickly to get things done.

I feel like our AWS team is a great match
for that culture, and they're always

there to listen to us, give us
brainstorming ideas, architectural advice

and help us to deliver
operational excellence for our customers.

I'm looking forward to our next steps
together to innovate

jointly and help more and more CFOs
globally.

Here at Lucanet, we are incredibly excited
about what the future will bring

alongside the continuing evolution
of our CFO solution platform.

We see a whole host of possibilities
unlocked

by generative
AI to help our customers lead with ease.
